She's spent £12,000

on a caravan so she can go to
a field and defecate in a bucket.

I'm sorry, but when
we come to power,

caravanning is going to
be banned.

And that's it. And on that
bombshell, it's time to end.

Thank you very much
for watching.
Normal service will be resumed
next week. Good night.
